about_the_game:
Pebble wakes up alone in a big world. He only has his unique ability to manipulate time and the quest to find his parents.
Jump into a unique adventure, uncover what happened, visit mystical places and solve puzzles to reach your goal.

JUMP ‘N’ ROLL

Master your jumping skills and roll around a world full of challenges and mysterious traps.

MANIPULATE TIME

Shift objects through time and rebuild a wasteland. Combine your knowledge about time and space to reach new places.

EXPLORE A SMALL OPEN WORLD

Visit different areas in the order you like. A unique set of challenges awaits you in every region.

FIND OUT WHAT HAPPENED

Travel between past and present to discover what transpired before you woke up.
